title: Candidate responses to Halton’s federal election questionnaire now available online (Regional Municipality of Halton)
text: ( Source : Regional Municipality of Halton ) Release Date : Oct 8, 2015 Halton voters can now view how local federal election candidates would address key growth-related issues facing the community. Many of the candidates' responses to the
